agentcom: Here we have EPF Command|As you can see, it's having some issues|Technical difficulties and what not|After being blown up by Herbert|Repairs are underway though!
agentlobbymulti: This is the Everyday Phoning Facility|which is ACTUALLY a secret entrance|to Elite Penguin Force Command|That's still technically classified info|But I think you got the right stuff to be an agent|Hit that target with a snowball to volunteer
agentvr: This is called the VR room.|VR stands for Virtual Reality.|Here you can see what the old HQ looked like...|...before it was destroyed by a popcorn device.
attic: This is the Lodge Attic.|It has been used to store just about anything!|It also has more Find Four tables.
beach: This is the Beach, home of the Lighthouse.|It is a great place to relax in the sun.|Sometimes you see the pirate ship docked here!
beacon: The Beacon holds the Lighthouse spotlight...|...and a telescope that you can look through.|And if you thought penguins could not fly...|...you should try the Jetpack game on the right.
berg: This is the Iceberg. It is a secret room.|In the distance you can see Club Penguin.|If you want to dive into the ocean depths...|...try out the Aqua Grabber!
boiler: This is the Boiler Room.|It gives electricity and heat to Club Penguin.|Here you can read old editions of the newspaper.|It is a great way to learn about Club Penguin.
book: Here we have the office for the Club Penguin Times|If you're looking for the latest news on the island...|...this is definitely the place to be!
boxdimension: Welcome to the Box Dimension.|This mysterious place is the source of all boxes.|Please leave the laws of physics at the door.
cave: Here we have the Cave, which has its own pool.|It also has windows to see underwater.|Wait a moment, and a crab may walk by.
cavemine: Here we have the Mine Cave...|Some workers say they've found buried treasure...|So grab a hardhat and start digging!
cove: This is the Cove!|It is a wonderful, secluded spot.|You can go swimming in the shallow water here.|Or, test your surf skill and catch some waves!
dance: Welcome to the Night Club.|This is THE place for dance parties.|That green puffle on the speaker is called the Keeper...|He was gone for a short while recently...|So it's good to have him back!
dock: Welcome to the Dock.|You can play Hydro-Hopper here.|Take a ride on a tube behind the speedboat.
dojo: Here we are in the Dojo.|Learn to become a Ninja with Card-Jitsu.|Train and earn belts to progress.|Only the dedicated will succeed.
dojoext: This is the Courtyard.|It was covered in snow for many moons!|Enter the Dojo and take the path of the Ninja.
dojofire: Welcome to the Fire Dojo atop the Volcano!|Here ninjas learn to master the element of fire,|by playing Card-Jitsu Fire!|Talk to Sensei over there to learn more!
dojohide: Welcome to the Ninja Hideout.|Here we can learn to master the elements.|The glowing tablets open the Elemental Dojos....|...where we can play Card-Jitsu Fire or Water.|Let's go inside...
dojowater: Welcome to the Water Dojo.|At the Waterfall you can earn your Water Suit.|Only the most powerful ninjas will succeed...
eco: This is the Recycling Plant!|Throw your recycling into the Recycletron 3000...|...and turn rubbish into useful things!
forest: Welcome to the Forest!|Go to the Cove by walking down those stairs...|...or take the top right path to the Mine Shack...|...and help out at the garden.
forts: Here we have the Snow Forts|As you can see, there's a time machine here|that Gary is using to travel to the past|Well, what are we waiting for?|Let's go!
lake: Wow! This place is the Hidden Lake...|Where did all this treasure come from, I wonder...|And it looks like there's a door under the water...
light: This is the Lighthouse...|...the tallest building in Club Penguin.|Take a look at the pictures on the wall...|...or grab a new instrument and perform on stage.|Go upstairs to find the Beacon!
lodge: The Ski Lodge is a great place to warm up.|Or, you can play Find Four with friends.|You can also go Ice Fishing out the back door.
lounge: This is the second floor of the Night Club.|It is called the Lounge.|It is a great place to rest after dancing.|Also, fun arcade games are found here.
mine: Welcome to the Mine...|During recent construction work...|... puffles were seen entering the tunnel...|...and some are now trapped inside.|Over there is the Rescue Squad's base of operations.|They need your help, and fast!
mtn: Welcome to the Ski Mountain!|This is the place to be if you like to sled.|Sled Racing is very popular.|The easiest course is the Bunny Hill.|The hardest is the Ridge Run.
party1: Welcome to the Time Trekker|When traveling through time please note|keep all flippers inside the vehicle at all times|please remain seated until the time anomaly is finished
party10: Ahh, this be Hunting Spot|good place to catch dinner|watch out though|also good place to be caught for dinner!
party11: HEADS UP!|This Ptero Town|It filled with flying Dinos|me no like flying Dinos|much worse than pigeons
party12: This is Scary Ice|this big fish very mad|he no like being frozen|please no tap on ice|it make angry fish beast madder
party2: GRUB GRUB!|This be Tree Place|It are named for so many trees|Watch where step|Dinos get mad when smoosh eggs
party3: Here be Stony Town|It nice place|Good spot to rest bottom|Dinos not come by so much|OH! Look! Fire!|Is new invention!
party4: YUM YUM!|that restaurant name YUM YUM|here am many good things to eat|like ptero pizza|t rex burgers|and tricera salad|salad am favorite. It made of meat
party5: This be Big Water Place|it are nice place to tour|hardly anyone gets eaten here|please watch out for lava though|it not taste good|trust me
party6: SHHHHH!|This be Dino Nest place|many Dinos make nests here|Nice place to raise family maybe?|Look for sparkly shells in sand|Me love sparklies
party7: YUCK!|No, me not get dirty|that name of place. YUCK! Swamp|Is nice place to swim|but watch out for swampy Dinos|they eat you, even if you yucky
party8: YIKES! This be Tricera Town!|Many pointy head Dinos here|they like to SMASH and crush|of course they no crush tour guides|is rude
party9: AHH! TOUR GO FAST HERE!|THIS BE TYRANNO TOWN!|MANY SHARP TEETH HERE!|RUN!!!!
pet: The Pet Shop is where you can adopt a puffle.|Puffles have different colors and personalities.|They all like penguins, and make great pets.|Hey! Check out the cannon...|...and blast off on an adventure in Puffle Launch!
rink: Welcome to the Stadium sports fans!|Take part in the action and start a game!|Or grab a snack and watch from the bleachers.|You can buy items for your igloo...|...and sports gear from the booth.
shack: Welcome to the Mine Shack...|Home of the Mine and the Community Garden!|Help water the garden by throwing snowballs...|...into the green bucket.|Beside the beautiful tree is the Recycling Plant...|...where we use garbage to make useful stuff!
ship: This is the pirate ship, the Migrator. Arrrr!|Rockhopper sails the seas in this ship.
shiphold: Here is the ship's cargo hold.|This is where Rockhopper sells his rare items.
shipquarters: This is the Captain's Quarters!|Rockhopper spends a lot of time here.|Look at the corkboard for his photos!|Or, grab a friend and hunt for some treasure!
shop: This is the Gift Shop.|You can buy clothes from the monthly catalog.|Colors and backgrounds can be bought as well.|Use coins you have earned from playing games.
sport: Welcome to the Sports Shop.|Here, you can buy all sorts of sports equipment.
stage: UGG!|This place be pretend|dinos no really bite bite here|me like pretend dinos|much nicer than dinos that eat you
underwater: BLUB! This place is Underwater...|Look at all the colorful fish and plants! And treasure!|This place sure is unusual...
village: Here we have the Ski Village.|Here you'll find the Ski Hill and the Ski Lodge...|...and a badly damaged Everyday Phoning Facility
